metadata.title: CVE-2017-7544 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
libexif through 0.6.21 is vulnerable to out-of-bounds heap readvulnerability in exif_data_save_data_entry function in libexif/exif-data.ccaused by improper length computation of the allocated data of an ExifMnoteentry which can cause denial-of-service or possibly information disclosure.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-7544` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libexif12 - 0.6.21-4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libexif package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.6.21-4').
